g.text: The TMForum Loyalty Management API Specification
A reference to a loyalty program specification.
A person or group that opts in to a loyalty program.
An instance of a loyalty program specification, linked to a specified loyalty member.
A loyalty account, containing loyalty balances.
Loyalty rule, containing conditions, event types and actions.
An event type used to match filter incoming loyalty events.
A condition, comprised of a attribute that will be tested against a value.
A partner engaged in the Loyalty Program
A specialised event to process direct loyalty points earnings.
A specialised event to process direct loyalty points redemption for purchases
